Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same. Hyperlinking to our Content The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval: Government agencies; Search engines; News organizations; Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and Systemwide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site. We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of SailAway Boats; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information. These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement, or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site. pages.index: Welcome to SailAway Boats - Your Ultimate Boating Destination SailAway Boats +91-770-9493317 Home Accuracy and passion Our services Join Our boats sailawayboats@gmail.com Welcome to SailAway Boats Explore the Finest Selection of Boats for Your Next Adventure Discover a world of possibilities with SailAway Boats. From sleek yachts to sturdy fishing vessels, we offer a diverse range of boats to suit every water enthusiast. Start your journey with us today and set sail towards unforgettable experiences on the open seas. Start Quality Craftsmanship Crafted with Precision and Passion At SailAway Boats, we take pride in the meticulous craftsmanship that goes into each vessel. Our boats are built to last, combining innovation with tradition for an unparalleled on-water experience. 95% Handcrafted Detailing 30+ Years of Expertise 100% Customer Satisfaction Our Services Comprehensive Solutions for Your Boating Needs 1 Boat Sales: Discover the perfect boat for your lifestyle and budget. 2 Boat Rentals: Experience the thrill of boating without the commitment. 3 Boat Maintenance: Keep your boat in top condition with our expert services. 4 Boat Storage: Secure and convenient storage options for your watercraft. Event Updates Stay informed about upcoming boating events in your area. Customer Stories Read inspiring stories from our satisfied customers. Behind the Scenes Explore the making of our exceptional boats. Expert Advice Receive expert advice on boat maintenance and care. pages.privacy-policy: SailAway Boats Privacy Policy SailAway Boats +91-770-9493317 Home Accuracy and passion Our services Join Our boats sailawayboats@gmail.com Privacy Policy Welcome to SailAway Boats! Before you dive into exploring our website, please take a moment to read this disclaimer carefully. If you do not agree with any part of this disclaimer, we kindly ask you to refrain from using our website. It is your responsibility to review this disclaimer periodically for any changes. We do not warrant that our website will be error-free, uninterrupted, secure, or free from viruses or other harmful components. Any reliance you place on our website is strictly at your own risk. Entire Agreement This disclaimer constitutes the entire agreement between you and SailAway Boats regarding your use of our website, superseding any prior agreements or understandings, whether written or oral. Severability If any provision of this disclaimer is found to be invalid or unenforceable under applicable law, such provision shall be deemed modified to the minimum extent necessary to make it valid and enforceable. The remaining provisions of this disclaimer shall remain in full force and effect. Modifications SailAway Boats reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the operation of our website or any part of it with or without notice. We may also impose limits on certain features and services or restrict your access to parts or all of the website without prior notice or liability. These third-party services may collect information about your use of our website and may have their own terms of service and privacy policies. SailAway Boats is not responsible for the actions or policies of these third parties. User-Generated Content SailAway Boats may allow users to submit, post, or share content on our website, including but not limited to comments, reviews, and forum posts. By submitting content to SailAway Boats, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and display the content in any form, medium, or technology now known or later developed. You agree that any content you submit to SailAway Boats will not violate any third-party rights, including copyright, trademark, privacy, or publicity rights, or contain any unlawful, defamatory, obscene, or offensive material. We strive to comply with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) to make our website user-friendly and accessible to everyone. If you encounter any accessibility barriers while using our website, please contact us at sailawayboats@gmail.com so that we can address the issue promptly. Feedback We welcome your feedback, suggestions, and ideas to improve SailAway Boats. If you have any comments or recommendations regarding our website or services, please feel free to share them with us at sailawayboats@gmail.com. We value your input and will carefully consider all feedback received.
